hotels.description: Feel the bustling energy of Khon Kaen, a lively city festooned with wonders and attractions, with an escape to Avani Khon Kaen Hotel & Convention Centre. One of the 'big four of Isan', the bustling city is a haven of activity - stumble on treasures at Walking Street Markets, savour local delicacies or let temples transport you through time. For those staying in, satiate your palate at one of the seven restaurants and bars, soak up the sun at the outdoor pool or sing your heart out at the karaoke venue.
